title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens. The expected behavior is that the action should add the Javadoc for the selected field.
EB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the Javadoc for the selected field should be added.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view. 3. Right-click on the selected field to open the context menu. 4. From the context menu, choose the 'Add Javadoc' option.
